name: expressjs-basics-5.30
description: 1. npm init -y 2. npm i express --save 3. npm i nodemon --save-dev 4. .gitignore 5. node_modules in .gitignore 6. index.js 7. update script in package.json    a. "dev" : "nodemon index.js"    b. "start" : "node index.js" 8. npm run dev 9. In index.js, require express 10. create app using express() 11. app.get() // Hello world 12. app.listen()
